thread.title: Photos: Fire Chief John B. Stewart Jr. - Courant Community
thread.title_full: Photos: Hartford Fire Chief John B. Stewart Jr. - Courant Community

author: courant.com
title: Photos: Fire Chief John B. Stewart Jr. - Courant Community
text:
Caption Wake For John B. Stewart Jr. Lauren Schneiderman / Hartford Courant Hartford firefighters salute former Hartford Fire Chief John B. Stewart Jr., at his wake at the Faith Congregational Church in Hartford on Tuesday. Stewart was the first African American fire chief in New England and was a well-respected public servant.
Hartford firefighters salute former Hartford Fire Chief John B. Stewart Jr., at his wake at the Faith Congregational Church in Hartford on Tuesday. Stewart was the first African American fire chief in New England and was a well-respected public servant.
(Lauren Schneiderman / Hartford Courant) Wake For John B. Stewart Jr. Lauren Schneiderman / Hartford Courant Mika Benford says goodbye to her uncle, former Hartford Fire Chief John B. Stewart Jr., at his wake at the Faith Congregational Church in Hartford on Tuesday with her daughter, Brooklyn Robinson. Chief Stewart was the first African American fire chief in New England and was a well-respected public servant.
Mika Benford says goodbye to her uncle, former Hartford Fire Chief John B. Stewart Jr., at his wake at the Faith Congregational Church in Hartford on Tuesday with her daughter, Brooklyn Robinson. Chief Stewart was the first African American fire chief in New England and was a well-respected public servant.
(Lauren Schneiderman / Hartford Courant) See more galleries This photo gallery is featured in these articles: Cityline Friends, Colleagues Remember Ex-Fire Chief John B. Stewart: 'He Opened A Lot Of Doors'
